description: Try our easy to follow Banana Bread Splits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Banana bread,Pescatarian,Strawberry,Microwave,High tea,Seafood free,Chocolate,Valentine's Day,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Banana Bread Splits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave in 30 second bursts or until melted, stirring in between.
Using a small heart-shaped cookie cutter or a small sharp knife, carefully cut heart shapes from banana bread slices.

Line a plate with paper towel. Heat a non-stick pan over low heat, and add butter. When butter is just melted, add banana bread hearts and cook for one minute on each side or until golden. Remove to prepared plate.

To assemble, place two scoops of ice cream down the centre of two small bowls. Place banana halves on either side. Decorate with banana bread hearts, whipped cream and strawberries. Drizzle with melted chocolate to serve.
